user_sentiment: Mildly unsatisfied - user approved the previous fix but immediately identified a new visual issue with the drag interaction appearance.
execution_quality: Well-executed with targeted fix. The agent efficiently located the relevant code, understood the gesture logic, and made a precise edit to the event handler.
work_category: Bug fix for gesture handling in mobile UI. The agent identified and corrected long-press behavior in pantry category/location views to enable drag-and-drop instead of navigation.
summary: The agent successfully fixed the long-press gesture behavior to enable drag-and-drop in pantry views. While the fix addressed the stated issue, the user's immediate follow-up about visual inconsistency suggests the implementation may have missed the full context of how the drag state should visually appear, indicating slightly incomplete alignment with the complete feature intent.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a follow-up issue in the same feature area, indicating they're actively testing and found a visual consistency problem. This suggests iterative refinement of the drag-and-drop feature.
